meanings.definition: The state or condition of being excessively overweight or fat.
meanings.sent1: Her obeseness made it difficult for her to climb the stairs.
meanings.sent2: The doctor advised him to exercise regularly to reduce his obeseness.
meanings.sent3: Despite his obeseness, he still managed to win the dance competition.
meanings.sent4: The city's obeseness in fast-food restaurants was evident on every street corner.
meanings.sent5: The obeseness of the elephant compared to the mouse was astonishing.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being obese.
meanings.sent1: The obeseness of the cake was evident from its rich frosting.
meanings.sent2: She struggled with the obeseness of her wardrobe, filled with oversized clothes.
meanings.sent3: The obeseness of the situation was comical as they tried to fit the giant pizza through the door.
meanings.sent4: The obeseness of the clouds in the sky signaled an impending storm.
meanings.sent5: His obeseness of knowledge on the subject impressed the entire class.
